name: Galarian Zigzagoon

evolution.description: Galarian Zigzagoon can evolve into Galarian Linoone at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Raccoon Pokémon. Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokémon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: When suffering from a negative status condition, this Pokémon’s speed increases by 15 ft.
